text: aාsiya bankuwen lankawata wadipura mudal..

ape eka ithin damma api okkotama patiyak, kohomada mage wada kiyala.

kolambaa tharstan widyalayiya jala krida samajaya adhyapana amathyansha anumathiya sahithawa shri lanka jala krida sangamaye adhikshanaya yatathe sanwidhanaya karana labana wayas sima aadhunika pihinum shurathawaliya labana masa 1wanida sita 3da dakwa widyalayiya pihinum thatakayedi pawathwe.diwayine pihinum kridawa prachalitha kirime aramunin aadhunikayan sandahama wenwu me pihinum isaw sandaha pasal magin pamanak ayadumpath yomukala yuthu athara jala krida samaja niyojanaya karana tharagakaruwan pasal magin ayadum kala yuthuya.tharagawaliye samastha balaka balika shurayin sandaha greshan gunawardhana ha mejar jenaral waidya dadli perera abhiyogatha kusalanayada anushurayin ha wayas kanda shuratha sandaha kusalana piriname.tharaga isawwaladi nisilesa tharaga nimakara siyaluma tharagakaruwan sandaha sahathikapath pirinamena bawa sanwidhayakayo pawasathi.

kasala wena wenama bahara karanna melesa wena wenama kasala bahara kirima magin obata amathara aadayamakda upaya gatha hakiyi.kadadasi plastik wani da alewi kirima mangin menma kussiyen iwath karana aaharamaya dira yana drawya walin kompost sada gatha hakiyi .

udakande nanda nona marimata nam kisima sambandhayak nathayi handamin pawasannata wuna.

agen nirathuru mese wimasima samajaya siya wagakima kotagena sitiyi.

yuddhaya awasan wisaduma lesa sitha rajapaksha palanaya katayuthu kirima thula, methek thaman jathiyak saha janathawak lesa godananwu wada yahapath paramadarshayanta, wada diyunu aakalpayanata, suwisheshi shishtacharayata, wishala kalalak siduwubawa danna ema janayawa dinaganimata rajapaksha palanaya ketharam thiwra lesa yuddha jayagrahanaya saha sanwardhana prawruththi ismathu kalada kisisethma nohakiwiya.
mita amatharawa kridakayange prawahana katayuthu sandaha wedi nowadina ratha yoda ganimatath kridakayan wenuwen purna aarakshawa sahitha hotal wen kirimatath owun piyawara gena thibe.
